item.title: Logseq/Tips
item.description: Illustration of Logseq’s implemented task states: Discoed Link Vault survival kit Discord Link Save a current safari selection to Logseq as a quote and link Discord Link iCloud shortcut While querying a page that uses namespace, replace the slash with underscore. So if the page name is projects/2022, in advanced query it should be “projects_2022” A new shortcut using @sawhneys shortcut as reference to add dictated text as a note to logseq (today) with a tag #voicenote
